roundsDetails.Aptitude:
Total 20 questions (MCQ type)

14 questions are apptitude from ratio,percentage,salary,etc.

6 questions from c programming guess the output,find the bug in code,etc.
roundsDetails.Technical:
5 problems will be given.
Any programing language can be used

Problems like
1.Find the second biggest in array
2.Patterns printing.
3.if a word start with vowel print the word double time
example 
Input:
I will eat ice cream
Output:
I I will eat eat ice ice cream


They only check how we approach the problem they don't ask to compile the code 

Tips:
1.use comments to explain the logic in the code
roundsDetails.technical round in Google meet:
It is similar to the second round

But it was conducted in google meet where a person from company ask you questions we need to solve that

Questions like

Print the larger digit from the number example 1234-> o/p is 4

Find the Middle element in the array

Pattern program like

*+++*
*+++*
*+++*

Reverse the even row

12345
44808
54321
47513

Output:
12345
80844
54321
31574
roundsDetails.Talk with CEO:
Question from resume,data structures and database.

What is primary key and foreign key?

roundsDetails.Group discussion:
They will give the topic in group discussiong.
ex: they give the topic about online class education,social medias etc. we want to explain maximum 5 minutes.
roundsDetails.Technical round: They asked me to introduce myself next they will ask programming questions like oops concepts, string-based questions, and most of the questions from my resume. they mostly checked our attitude and communication
roundsDetails.Hr round: They asked about personal details and check my communication skills
roundsDetails.Ceo round:
Ceo is checked my attitude and knowledge.
They checked my patients level

pros: Good place to work and give a good domain for you.Based upon your performance in your project they will increase your salary.

roundsDetails.Apitude:
First round conduct apitude.
Apitude questions are average level.
roundsDetails.Technical: In second round questions from java and SQL basics before they conduct second round they teach  java and SQL basic in 4 days in our college
roundsDetails.Java swing: Third round they ask to build a software like billing software before that they will teach us java swing and SQL and how to create a billing software for 5 day on 6th day they will ask to build the application

pros: You can learn lot of things in java and sql

roundsDetails.Group discussion: They asked to talk any topic for 2min
roundsDetails.Aptitude test:
The questions are asked from all topics each topic has 10 questions
Topics are comprehension, numberical reasoning, verbal reasoning, percentage,ratio, permutations and combinations
roundsDetails.Technical Aptitude test:
After apptitude test technical apptitude test
Question from the topics are operating system, database,SQL,c,web technologies,linux, networking,etc
roundsDetails.HR round: Face to face interview.first introduce yourself next the most of the question from your resume only

roundsDetails.group discussion: the company asked to talk about any topic for 2 min. so prepare before
roundsDetails.aptitude:
Prepare all the quantitative aptitude questions.
This round contains 40 questions.
roundsDetails.techincal aptitude:
In this round you want to prepare all the programming language and their basics.
Example - oops,Data structure,Network,c,Html.
This round contains 40 questions
IMPORTANT- you want to know the basics of all the above.
roundsDetails.HR interview: Questions are asked from your Resume and programming languages that you added on it.

roundsDetails.Coding Test - 2: More advanced coding test for toppers.
roundsDetails.Technical Interview: All questions will be based on your introduction and resume.
roundsDetails.HR Interview: Easy for me. No trick questions. Depends on HR. May ask questions like, "Why join us?", "What makes you are fit for the role?"

pros: Still have not joined the company. Just got the offer.

roundsDetails.Apitude and logical programming:
First round interview conduct on online.
30 aptitude questions and 2 logical programming solve using any language.

Logical questions
 Ex.sum of the diagonal of the matrix and sum of the array
roundsDetails.Technical HR and Coding:
Second round conduct offline in pet college. This round contains
Two rounds
First they had face to face technical questions
Questions from 
Oops concepts , what is your Passion, how you spend your time ,what language you good at


Once you completed they will give technical questions 
10 C program MCQ ,4 SQL queries and  3 logical program

C programming questions like find the output and find the error in code etc..

Basic SQL queries 

Logical program's like 
 Ex:find Given number is odd or even but not using division, multiplication operator and predefined functions

 Square root of number without using Multiplication
roundsDetails.HR:
Next HR
Questions like

Self introduction
What you did with your first salary?
Tell about something in English for 2min

Questions from resume 
If you to project they will ask about that

offCampusDetail: Applied through PET  engineering college pool campus drive

roundsDetails.Aptitude:
online test(1 hour)- First round was conducted in online mode.
30 (30 mins) questions in first round. 1'st part contain mathematical 2'nd part contain verbal questions.

Program(30 mins) -2 logical program (pretty easy). 

Most of the mathematical question came from combination , probability and general question.

Eg:
if a number added trice the result of the number is same as add by the 34.Guess the number?
A)15  B)12 C)8 D)17
roundsDetails.Technical -1:
Interviewer ask question like self intro, which language you are strong?, why do you choose that language?.

This round selection is mostly based on aptitude mark.
roundsDetails.Technical -2:
First half & hour you should write program logic in paper.

This part contain 4 or 5 question.

Interviewer saw only the logic so don't bother about minute mistake.

Then interviewer ask the question about the logic of the program and general question.

Eg:
 1.My first program is square root of the given number without using build-in function and *,/.

interviewer asked the question was what is the relation of addition and multiplication.

2. input A=1234;
   output B=4321;
3. input A=1234;
   output A=1+2+3+4=10=1+0=1;
         adding the number continuously until 
    occur a single digit.
4.  input A=college.txt
    output A=college.pdf 
    without using a build-in function.
roundsDetails.HR:
HR round is mostly  interactive manner.
Firstly self intro, then question is based on your resume.
Questions like what is your role model ,hobbies, what is a special on your native district.

why do you choose a job? what is your next plan?
I said my next plan is investing money in digital Currency.HR next question is what is digital currency describe that.

So Answer the question wisely.

This is a most import round for your selection.
selection is based on your competitor.

Everyone treated in a friendly manner including HR.

pros: I don't know about the working environment of the company but everyone is treated friendly.

roundsDetails.Programming Round:
There are two sections
1.java programs
2.PL/SQL programs

Programs like find second largest number in the array and Binary search
roundsDetails.Technical:
Basic Java questions and oops concepts
Ask any program to write in front of interviewer
Exception and thread concepts
roundsDetails.HR: Analyse your skills and ask some details about you

pros: Good place to work and learn

roundsDetails.Aptitude:
all common topics and C MCQ
aptitude questions from speed,train concept,reasoning,blood relation

roundsDetails.Programming Round:
Written Test(Nine Questions)
1.Write Four Programs using any language(Duplicate character in String, Word count in String, Each Row & Column Addition in Matrix, Fibonacci series).
2.Write Two PL/SQL Programs(Reverse Number, Palindrome String).
3.To find Three Programs Output in C.
roundsDetails.Technical HR: Ask about Round 1 programs in Detail, OOPS concept, JAVA.
roundsDetails.HR: Introduce your self and asking about family details.

roundsDetails.Aptitude/Programming Quiz: Aptitude will be easy. The programming section is more of logic than language. Basics of C may be required. Exam conducted on offline.
roundsDetails.Coding:
You will have to code for given problems. Problems will not be too hard. But they are not easy. Questions were given directly. Some of the problems are like printing patterns, searching, sorting. You will need basic knowledge of DSA to clear this round.

Total 10 question they we need to solve in order some question given below

1.input 10 

output:
1 27 26 25 24 23 22 21 20 19
   2 28 45 44 43 42 41 40 18
      3 29 46 54 53 52 39 17
         4 30 47 55 51 38 16
            5 31 48 50 37 15
               6 32 49 36 14
                  7 33 35 13
                     8 34 12
                        9 11
                          10

2. input:7

output:
1111111111111
1000000000001
1011111111101
1010000000101
1010111110101
1010100010101
1010101010101
1010100010101
1010111110101
1010000000101
1011111111101
1000000000001
1111111111111

3.input : cseboys

output:
---b
--e-o
-s--y
c----s
-s--y
--e-o
---b

4. input is an array of characters and a word find a word that is given in an array

input1:
a b c z
o h o o
b k u h
j o k o

input2: zoho 

output: yes (because zoho present in given array)

5. A string will give print the string in alphabetical order.

input:cseboys
output:bceossy

7. Find a no of zero of factorial of a number time complexity O(log n)

input:5
output:1 (because 5!=120 which has one zero)
roundsDetails.Advanced Coding:
You will have to code for given problems. Problems will be harder. But they are not easy. Problem statements are represented as in real-world scenarios.

total 6 questions some questions given below

1. u are given an array of prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on an ith day.

You want to maximize your profit by choosing a single day to buy one stock and choosing a different day in the future to sell that stock. such that we get more profit

input1:7

input2:100 180 260 310 40 535 695

output:
profit 865
when to buy and sell {0, 3} {4, 6}

2. Let's say the bishop is in {x, y} position on the chessboard. How many turns will it need to go to {l, m}? Chess rules followed.

3. Let's say the horse is in {x, y} position on the chessboard. How many turns will it need to go to {l, m}? Chess rules followed

4.validate the parentesises 
input :()())
output: invalid
roundsDetails.Interview: Technical Round:
You don't need to prepare for a self-intro. There will be logical puzzles, aptitude. Then there will be questions on your programming knowledge. Efficiency is more important than how fast you can find an answer.

they ask questions from the programming language you strong and data structures

question like 

what is python? , what are decorators in python, what is linked list,stack
roundsDetails.Interview: Managerial Round: There will be questions from your resume. And some logical problems based on a real-world application.
roundsDetails.Interview: HR Round: There may be some tricky questions like Why should I hire you, Why join us, What is your ambition, How long will you work, What do you like about us, What you think about Zoho, etc. There will also be question on your personal background.

pros:
One of the best work environments physically
Nice work culture
Tasty food - I really have to say this :)
cons:
No Job Security
Hefty selection process

roundsDetails.Registration: Applied through official Websites and Register using Superset platform
roundsDetails.Online Assessment:
Time-140 minutes
1.Aptitude Test - logical, Verbal, Quantitative. (Simple aptitude questions) 
Duration:60 min
2.Programming Test - 2 programs, Choose any one of the programming languages that are given like C, C++, Java, Python (programs using array concepts, matrix , sorting and so..) 
Duration:60 min
3.Written Communications Test - Essay Writing about 200-300 words (general topics) 
Duration:20 min
roundsDetails.Business Discussion:
Candidates who clears the online test would go through Business Discussion
Business Discussion is both Technical and HR interview through superset
prepare for 
1.self intro
2.OOPs concept
3.Data structures
4.go through SQL
5.About project(or any mini project) and your role in that project
roundsDetails.LOI:
Letter Of Intent
In this step, choose any 3 locations and 3 preferred skills.
After this, they choose any one of the location and gave offer letter.

pros: One of the Leading MNC and they are product based company

roundsDetails.Online Assessment:
Aptitude test (simple mathematical and verbal aptitudes)
2 programs use any of languages given (C,C++,C#,Java,Python) programs using matrix and array concepts
roundsDetails.Technical Interview 1:
Face to Face direct technical interview 
Questions about Technical Skills, Internship, Hobbies and other things mentioned in resume.
roundsDetails.Technical Interview 2:
The shortlisted candidates have written test. There are 4 set of question, each set contains one maths problem and one program
All the maths problems are finding the area using radius or length & breadth which are not directly given(go through area formulae)
The programs are simple array concepts(eg: sum of digits, difference of sum of even and odd digits, reverse the array of numbers) The interviewer need not the exact output of the program, they only saw how we try to write the program and rise the questions in that program.
roundsDetails.HR Interview:
HR round is very interactive.
*first one - self introduction
*HR asked to talk about any general topic in 
 English like any movies, what kind of advice 
 gave to current generation youngsters.
*About answer sheet in Technical Interview 2
*About family members
*They see how we interactively talk
*Only half of the students are selected in  final HR round

roundsDetails.Build full stack application:
Give 2day time and asked to build full stack discuss forum using Mern stack

Project description:
Discussions page

Frontend - React
Backend - Nodejs, register express routes

Database Use Mongodb, you can set up a free cluster through cloud atlas.

STEPS -
Should have a Sign-up page as well, which allows users to set a username and type in a password. Save those details to the database.

NOTE - password has to be hashed.

Create a login page - Use passports, to authenticate.
On login,
a) User can create a discussion forum - Have a button for :-
i) Topic ii) Description

b) Discussion list page - Anybody can view this page

c) Discussion Page - Logged in users can reply to the discussion

Unregistered users can view the discussion list page and discussion page

NOTE - Make sure that your react app is calling your express endpoints
that is in turn interacting with your db to update values.

Host this app on heroku
Checkin the code to a Github public repo.
